original_text: The goal is to predict an English answer string for an input English question. Question : The character 'Honey Rider' appeared in which Bond film? Answer : </s> The character 'Honey Rider' appeared in the James Bond film "Dr. No", which was released on October 5, 1962 and is number one in a series of twenty-four films produced by EON Productions. This information can be verified through various credible sources such as Wikipedia articles dedicated to both Honey Ryder and Dr. No (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Honey_Ryder; https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dr._No_(film)). </s> #### Dr. No </s>

original_text: I've always wondered: In which English county is the village of Stilton? </s> The answer is Cambridgeshire, England.
